cmdList: cat filename : display content of file
ls : list all files on the current folder
pwd : print name of current directory
rot : replaces all letters of a string with the Xth letter after it

mail.title: Welcome
mail.text: We need your help to catch the Molang.

exchange.q: hello I'm Macaron, what i can do for you ?
r: I want to go to the beach
I want to go to the zoo

exchange.q: Okay, let's go, do you want an ice cream ?
Great, what is your favorite animal ?
I've got Vanilla, Strawberry and chocolate
Okay, i will give you a salad
r: no, I hate salad, i prefer meat !

exchange.q: My favorite favour is coconuts
s: ... you know that Macaron likes coconuts !

exchange.q: Dont forget to brush your teeth after eating
You are very anoying
r: I am sorry, i was tied

exchange.q: I hope you have a good day, goodbye, see you later

mail.title: My Favorite food
s: ... you know that Macaron loves Pineapple.
